#  Load Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(sf)
library(countrycode)
library(ggspatial)
#library(RColorBrewer)
library(viridis)
library(showtext) # to change font
library(leaflet) # to create interactive map
```



# Read Data

Reproductivity for saving the data should be improved.

```{r}
# source: https://hub.arcgis.com/datasets/2b93b06dc0dc4e809d3c8db5cb96ba69_0/explore?location=-0.002619%2C0.000000%2C1.00
world_map <- st_read("Data/World_Countries_Generalized.geojson")

# source: https://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/2021-22_HDR/HDR21-22_Composite_indices_complete_time_series.csv
gii_table <- read_csv("Data/HDR21-22_Composite_indices_complete_time_series.csv") %>%
  dplyr::select(., iso3, country, contains("gii"))
```


# Data Analysis

```{r}
# Create ISO-2 character for merging with map data, and
# calculate the difference between 2019 and 2010
gii_table2 <- gii_table %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    .,
    iso2c = countrycode(iso3, origin = "iso3c", destination = "iso2c"),
    .before = country
  ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    .,
    gii_diff = gii_2019 - gii_2010,
    .after = country
  )

# Join map data with statistics
gii_map <- world_map %>%
  left_join(
    .,
    gii_table2,
    by = c("ISO" = "iso2c")
  )
```

# Creating a map

```{r}
# add fonts
font_add_google("Fira Sans")
showtext_auto()

# ggplot 
plot <- 
  ggplot(data = gii_map) +
  geom_sf(
    aes(fill = gii_diff, alpha = "No Data"), # add alpha to show 2nd legend for NA
    color = "black",
    lwd = 0.3
  ) + 

  # set title and caption
  labs(
    title = "Change in Gender Inequality between 2010 and 2019",
    caption = "Source: UNDP Human Development Reports (https://hdr.undp.org/data-center/documentation-and-downloads)"
  ) +

  # change scale aesthetics
  scale_fill_viridis(
    option = "magma",
    begin = 0,
    end = 1,
    name = "Difference in GII",
    na.value = "white",
    guide = guide_colorbar(
      direction = "horizontal",
      reverse = TRUE,
      barwidth = 20,
      barheight = 0.5,
      title.position = "top",
      title.hjust = 0.6,
      label.position = "bottom",
    )
  ) + 
  
  # scale for no data
  scale_alpha_manual(
    name = " ",
    values = 1,
    guide = guide_legend(
      keywidth = 3,
      keyheight = 0.5,
      title.position = "top",
      label.position = "bottom",
      override.aes = list(fill = "white")
    )
  ) +
  
  # aesthetics
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "lightcyan2", linewidth = 0),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "lightcyan2"),
    text = element_text(
      color = "blue",
      family = "Fira Sans"
    ),
    plot.title = element_text(
      size = 20,
      margin = margin(t = 10, b = 10),
      hjust = 0.5
    ),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 15),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.background = element_blank()
  ) 

plot
```

# Save Plot as image

image modification before saving 

```{r}
# change the theme to save
save <- plot + 
  theme(
    text = element_text(
      size = 30,
    ),
    plot.title = element_text(
      size = 50,
    ),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 30),
  ) 
  
# save ggplot to image
ggsave(
  "Output/GII.png",
  plot = save,
  height = 7,
  width = 7)

```

# Create interactive map of the data

```{r interactive_plot}
color_palette <- colorNumeric(
  palette = rev(viridisLite::viridis(20)),
  domain = gii_map$gii_diff
)

map <- leaflet(data = gii_map) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = ~color_palette(gii_diff),
    fillOpacity = 1,
    color = "white",
    weight = 1,
    highlight = highlightOptions(
      weight = 5,
      color = "white",
      bringToFront = TRUE
    ),
    label = paste("Country: ", gii_map$COUNTRY, "GII Difference: ", gii_map$gii_diff)
  ) %>%
  addLegend("bottomright", 
    pal = color_palette,
    values = gii_map$gii_diff,
    title = "GII Difference",
    opacity = 0.7,
    bins = 6,  # Set the number of legend bins (adjust as needed)
    na.label = "No Data"  # Specify a label for missing data
  )

# Display the map
map
```
